section.title: Pipeline::Profiling Struct Reference

para.para: This struct holds the information needed for the profiling of the processing unit @desc This struct holds all the information that the pipe will print when the print_profile method function is called.

listitem.para: The id of the node to profile.
The id of the thread that executed the processing unit.
The timestamp from the tsc in the CPU at the start of the RunNode function.
The timestamp from the tsc in the CPU at the end of the RunNode function.
The clock time at the start of the RunNode function.
The clock time at the end of the RunNode function.
The system time at the start of the RunNode function.
The system time at the end of the RunNode function.

section.section:
Detailed Description
This struct holds the information needed for the profiling of the processing unit @desc This struct holds all the information that the pipe will print when the print_profile method function is called.
The documentation for this struct was generated from the following file: include/headers/pipeline.h
